Posts.Content: melanomafirst wrote: I had my mamo & ultrasound on Friday, 10/22, biopsy on following Wed...was to get results on Friday 10/29.  Was called an told it was being sent off for a 2nd opinion, not to worry this doesn't mean it will be bad.  I understand all that, but in 09 I had melanoma and surgery to remove it.  I have been told that melanoma is a tricky cancer and can hide out in other areas of the body....hopefully not my boob.  7-10 more days is making me crazy. ~Mel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: waiting on answers melanomafirst lford91
